Matrix2 Class

Extends AbstractMatrix
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/Matrix2.ts:24
Module: math
Parent Module: EIGHT

2x2 (square) matrix of numbers. Constructs a Matrix2 by wrapping a Float32Array. The elements are stored in column-major order: 0 2 1 3

Constructor

Matrix2

(
  • elements
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/Matrix2.ts:24

Parameters:

  • elements Float32Array

    The elements of the matrix in column-major order.

reflection

(
  • n
)
Matrix2 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/Matrix2.ts:176

Sets this matrix to the transformation for a reflection in the line normal to the unit vector n.

this ⟼ reflection(n) = I - 2 * nT * n

Parameters:

  • n VectorE1

Returns:
